channel.title: [Delta] Item Handler, global item spawning crap
channel.description:
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2lizk3b.jpg[/img]
I used this[code]ItemHandler.createItemAll(1511, absX, absY, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[0]);[/code] and it spawns the item on the floor after I firemake which is excellent but it just wont go away and I cannot pick it up o.O
Does anybody know how I can make it disappear as the fire is created?
